meta.description: Rigorous definitions for statistical measures in geometric and degraded contexts
meta.semantic_constraint: ALL operations must be Manifold-Native. No Euclidean fallbacks.

robust.logic: Geodesic Truncation: If d_M(x, mu) > R, replace x with point at distance R along geodesic.
robust.fault_detection: If truncation_fraction > threshold, flag as 'Manifold Distribution Shift'.

streaming.math: Update Frechet Mean incrementally; Parallel Transport moments to new tangent space.

manifold_rank.concept: Rank by Geodesic Distance from Origin (or Anchor)
manifold_rank.tie_breaking: Lexicographic by angle in Tangent Space

approx_binned.logic: Map points to Voronoi cells of a fixed geometric atlas. Rank = sum(counts of 'lower' cells).
approx_binned.complexity: O(N) using Locality Sensitive Hashing (LSH) for Manifolds.

geometric_tau_b.math: Sign(d_M(A, B) - d_M(A, C)) * Sign(d_M(A', B') - d_M(A', C'))
geometric_tau_b.tie_handling: Tau-b denominator adjustment for ties in geodesic distance.
